Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory90.png'}
{3: 'The dozen of tall Constructs stand out conspicuously in the crowd. Staessen picks you and the others out in a glance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "You're back.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Apologies for my unauthorized departure, Captain Staessen, but 【kuroname】 and I brought Rosetta and her companions back.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Apology accepted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "And now... my turn for an apology for what I'm about to say.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'To tell you the truth, I just had a private exchange with representatives from other settlements.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'We have agreed to absolve you of the "sinner" status, but only under certain conditions.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So... I guess this hinges on the conditions?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "This works better for us as well. Knowing our reputation in the ARU, absolving us so lightly must've ruffled a few feathers.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: '...Indeed. I wanted to announce it publicly, but I was acting out of turn.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So, what are the conditions?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'You must retrieve two "Moses class" icebreakers from the Border Commune.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Border Commune?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'If you can complete this mission, the icebreakers will be immediately put to work establishing a new settlement for the Forest Guards.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'In the new settlement, Forest Guards will be regarded as equal members of the ARU.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Very well. This should be enough to win respect for the Forest Guards.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But before that, I think you need to explain to our guests here first.', 4: '1'}
